title: Tim Declercq Leaves ‘WolfPack’ for Lidl-Trek, Will Barta re-ups with Movistar
content:
'The Tractor' is the latest in a wave of signings for Lidl-Trek, while Movistar confirms 20 for 2024, with promises of more.

Read the full article at Tim Declercq Leaves ‘WolfPack’ for Lidl-Trek, Will Barta re-ups with Movistar on Velo.
author: ahood
